message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $120. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll really love it!
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I can only pay up to $95 for it. Let me know if this works for you.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $105. It's a fair price, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Hello Alice, I've considered your offer and am willing to pay $100 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations and we can finalize the transaction.
